title: Quality Management Expert Development Course for Language MOOCs for Business Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Language Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: A course for learners serving as administrators/leaders of corporate language MOOCs, focusing on enhancing long-term operational quality management competencies in mobile-based microlearning environments

learning_goals: Establish language content review criteria by applying MOOC quality evaluation models (e.g., MOOC Quality Project Framework)
Propose at least two MOOC improvement strategies based on learner data analysis (non-completion rates, interaction metrics)
Enhance learning effectiveness by over 20% by designing formative assessment tools (quizzes, feedback systems) optimized for mobile environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
